Device.Unknown: Unknown Drive type can't be determined.
Device.Local: Fixed Drive has fixed (nonremovable) media. This includes all hard drives, including hard drives that are removable.
Device.USB: Removable Drive has removable media. This includes all floppy drives and many other varieties of storage devices.
Device.Network: Remote Network drives. This includes drives shared anywhere on a network.
Device.CDROM: CDROM Drive is a CD-ROM. No distinction is made between read-only and read/write CD-ROM drives.
Device.RAM: RAMDisk Drive is a block of random access memory (RAM) on the local computer that behaves like a disk drive.
Device.NO_ROOT: The root directory does not exist.

Functions.ListofTypeDisk: Requesting information about disks in the system.
Functions.list_users: Getting a list of system users.
Functions.GetPingList: Loading a list of addresses for pings.

WriteBaseInfo.info: Writing basic PC information to a log file ...

createParser.NoHosts: Do not read and write data from the hosts file.
createParser.NoDiskInfo: Do not read or write computer disk sizes.
createParser.NoPing: Do not read or write ping data.
createParser.NoDefrag: Do not read and write disks fragmentation data.
createParser.NoSmart: Do not read or write S.M.A.R.T. disks data.
createParser.PingFile: A file with a list for ping addresses.

parser_a.NoDataYear: Do not sort log files by year.
parser_a.NoQarter: Do not sort log files by quarters.

main.smart: Analysis of S.M.A.R.T. information about disks in the system.
main.Log: Writing the received data to a log file ...
main.Fine: The system analysis has been successfully completed !
